You do not have any referrals yet By joining Fuzzie, you agree with the Bear\'s Privacy Policy and Terms and Conditions. MY FUZZIE FRIENDS Your warm & fuzzie message… How do I send a gift? Step 1: Personalise the gift with your friend\'s name and your message. \nStep 2: Once ready, checkout and make payment. \nStep 3: Send your gift! Your gift will be wrapped into a nice link that you can send by WhatsApp, SMS, Facebook Messenger, Email or copy and paste the link anywhere you like. How can my friends open and redeem my gift? They just need to click on the gift link that you sent to open your gift. To redeem, they need to sign in to their Fuzzie account (or create a new one if they don\'t have one). Your gift will be automatically added to their Gift Box and they can redeem anytime during their validity period. Who can I send gifts to? You can send your gifts to anyone who has a Singapore registered mobile number. What are the delivery methods available? You can send your gifts via WhatsApp, Facebook Messenger, SMS, Email or copy and paste the link anywhere you like. How long will delivery take? Delivery happens instantly! Do my friends need a Fuzzie account to receive my gift? They do not need an account to receive. But they will need to sign up to Fuzzie (or sign in if they already have an account) to redeem the gift. When I send a gift, who gets the cashback? You will be rewarded with the cashback and your friend gets your thoughtful gift! How will my gift look like? Pretty awesome, check it out below! Surprise friends with a warm & fuzzy gift card from their favourite brands. Delivery is instant! WhatsApp WeChat You don’t have any friends on Fuzzie yet. Invite friends with your referral code and the both of you will get S$5 each. CHANGE EMAIL Don\'t be shy. Make your first purchase and experience the wonders of instant cashback. Top Up Win S$15,000 & more every Friday, 7pm! Enter now to get your free Jackpot tickets.* Win S$15.000 and more each week*. Jackpot tickets are given free with every mini-coupon purchased GIFT BOX The game everyone\'s been waiting for. Look like you\'ve won a price during the draw. Write to us at jackpot@fuzzie.com.sg with your bank details. We will transfer the prize money directly to your bank account. You can now stock up your Jackpot tickets in your wallet after purchase and use them anytime later for any draw you like. Have fun & good luck! Cashback is a percentage of your item value that we give back to you instantly as Fuzzie Credits. You can use this right away to purchase anything you like on Fuzzie or cash out to your bank account. A Power Up is a temporary boost to your cashback for participating brands. The Power Up cashback for each brand is highlighted with a lightning icon. You can buy as many gift cards as you like during the Power Up period to enjoy the bonus cashback and use them anytime within the validity period of the gift cards. Jackpot tickets let you participate in the Fuzzie Jackpot. You can set your own 4-digit number on each ticket. Strike the winning number during our live draw and win awesome cash prizes given straight to your bank account. Live draws are based on actual Singapore Pools 4D game results. Get up to 2X higher cash prizes than Singapore Pools with the Jackpot! Learn more about your rewards Fuzzie gives you cashback on all your purchases. \n\nCashback is given instantly as Fuzzie credits and you can use it right away to buy anything you like on Fuzzie. \n\nS$1 = 1 credit \n\nYour credit works like cash and you can continue to enjoy cashback when you use it to make your purchase. (eg: Item costs S$100 and there is a 10% cashback. You use S$10 credits to offset purchase. You pay S$90 and you receive 10% x S$100= $10 credits). \n\nYour credits are valid for 2 years on a rolling basis. When you top up your credits, the expiry will shift to 2 years from the date of the top up. You can top up by simply shopping on Fuzzie and earning cashback, buying more credits or by activating Fuzzie Cards. \n\nJackpot tickets are valid for 90 days on a rolling basis. When you add a new Jackpot ticket to your wallet, the validity of all your tickets will be set to 90 days from that day. \n\nYou can set any 4-digit number you like on each Jackpot ticket and use it for any of the live draws. You can set a maximum of 10 Jackpot tickets per draw.
